檵字的基本解释

檵
jì
〔檵木〕常绿灌木或小乔木，叶椭圆形或卵圆形。枝条和叶子可提制栲胶，种子可榨油，叶可入药。亦称“檵花”、“纸末花”。
〔枸檵〕古书上指“枸杞”。

檵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》古詣切，去霽，見。］
(1)木名。檵木。金缕梅科。常绿灌木或小乔木。叶卵状椭圆形。春季开花，白色。中医以花、茎、叶入药。
(2)见“枸2檵”。

檵字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檵； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页558第39
【唐韻】古詣切【集韻】【韻會】吉詣切，?音計。【說文】木也。【爾雅·釋木註】枸檵，今枸杞。詳杞字註。

檵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
檵字的起名意思

暂无。

檵
Basic explanation of words
檵
jì
〔Luomu〕 Evergreen shrubs or small trees, with oval or ovoid leaves. The branches and leaves can be extracted from tannin extract, the seeds can be squeezed from oil, and the leaves can be used as medicine. Also known as "Luohua" and "Paper Flower".
[Goji berry] In ancient books, it refers to "Chinese wolfberry".
檵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guangyun" ancient legends cut, go to Ji, see. ]
(1) Wooden name. Loropod. Hamameliaceae. Evergreen shrubs or small trees. The leaves are oval-elliptic. Flowering in spring, white. In Chinese medicine, flowers, stems and leaves are used as medicine.
(2) See "Mu 2 Lu".
檵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檵; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 558 Page 39
[Tang Yun] Gu Yuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Quijoe,? Sound meter. [Said the text] Mu Ye. [Erya·Shimu Note] Chinese wolfberry, nowadays Chinese wolfberry. Detailed note of Qi characters.
檵

檵
Name meaning
Nothing.
jì, qǐ
1) лоропеталум китайский, ремнелепестник китайский (лат. Loropetalum chinense)
2) китайская дереза (лат. Lycium chinense)
